constructor.details: This constructor is called when deploying a contract that extends `SubscriptionCampaign`.

params.assetOwnership: The address managing asset ownership verification.
params.ledgerVault: The address of the ledger vault contract handling fund operations.
params.mmc: The address of the MMC token used for campaign-related transactions.

returns._0: The amount of funds allocated to the operator.
The available fund balance within the campaign.

params.account: The address of the account whose balance is being queried.
params.currency: The address of the currency to retrieve the balance for.

returns._0: The number of sponsored accesses used by this account.
The maximum number of times an account can use sponsored access.

params.account: The account to check usage state.

returns._0: True if the campaign is active for the operator-account pair; otherwise false.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only callable by the owner. Functions with `whenNotPaused` become unavailable.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

run(address).details: Checks allocation, available balance, and quota usage.

returns._0: The amount of allocated funds used during the run.

setFundsAllocation(uint256,address).details: Each operator can spend up to the allocated amount in each `run`.

params.amount: Maximum funds allocated per operator usage.
params.operator: The operator allowed to spend allocated funds.

setQuotaLimit(uint256).details: Defines how many times an account can use sponsored access.

params.limit: The maximum number of sponsored accesses.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Only callable by the owner. Functions with `whenNotPaused` become available again.

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract by passing dependencies to `CampaignBase`.

getFundsAllocation(address).notice: Retrieves the allocated funds for a specified operator.

getFundsBalance().notice: Retrieves the current campaign fund balance.

getLedgerBalance(address,address).notice: Retrieves the ledger balance of an account for a specific currency.

getQuotaCounter(address).notice: Retrieves the current quota counter for a given account.

getQuotaLimit().notice: Retrieves the maximum sponsored access quota.

getTotalUsage().notice: Returns the total usage (number of times sponsored accesses have been used globally).

initialize(address,uint256).notice: Initializes the contract with the owner, campaign description, and expiration time.

isActive(address,address).notice: Determines if the campaign is active or eligible for a given operator and account.

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, preventing certain functions from executing.

run(address).notice: Executes a campaign run for a specified account.

setFundsAllocation(uint256,address).notice: Allocates a certain amount of campaign funds to an operator.

setQuotaLimit(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum allowed sponsored accesses for each account.

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Indicates whether a given interface ID is supported by this contract.

unpause().notice: Resumes contract operations after a pause.

documentation.text:
@title CampaignSubscription
 @notice Abstract contract for managing subscription-based campaigns.
